titles.title: A bill to recover costs of providing services to farmer cooperatives and groups of producers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to assess fees (and late penalties and accrued interest) upon users of the wholesale market development program pursuant to the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 and other Federal law. States that such amounts shall be credited to the account that incurs the cost, without fiscal year limitations. Authorizes the Attorney General to bring an action in any appropriate U.S. court to recover unpaid charges.
